metadata.title: CVE-2019-12972 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (akalibbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.32. There is a heap-based bufferover-read in _bfd_doprnt in bfd.c because elf_object_p in elfcode.hmishandles an e_shstrndx section of type SHT_GROUP by omitting a trailing'\0' character.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
